title: ‘It Was First a Matter of Surviving’: Dogged Giro Ride by Van Aert Ends Long, Lonely Wait for a Big Win
content:
Siena an emotional setting for Wout van Aert as he lands first-ever Giro d’Italia stage to join exclusive club.

Read the full article at ‘It Was First a Matter of Surviving’: Dogged Giro Ride by Van Aert Ends Long, Lonely Wait for a Big Win on Velo.
author: sstokes
